## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a5014feae2671e422a28a92b6bd6f8a040a605699f1ebea3e44fb3f910e9e893)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'web-tv-app' @ 10.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
